Field.Name: CategoryTypeCode
Field.Description: The type of the category structure, e.g. NAVIGATION or BRAND. Predefined by Natch as a readonly category at the root (level 0).

Field.Name: ParentCategoryCode
Field.Description: The code of the parent category. Will contain the `CategoryTypeCode` for categories at highest level or non hierarchical structure.

Field.Name: Level
Field.Description: The level of the category in the tree, starting at value `1`. If the structure is not hierarchical, use value `1`.

Field.Name: OrigOrderValue
Field.Description: Defines the order in which the categories under a node are placed. This is a text field, sorting is alphabetical.

Field.Name: AutoCompleteWeight
Field.Description: The optional weight of the category to calculate the score in search results of the generic autocomplete.
